name: Wifibook
tagline: (ANDROID) Wifibook intelligently toggles the wifi radio on and off on android devices.By toggling wifi based on proximity to familiar networks, Wifibook aims to:Increase battery lifeImprove connectivity/ResponsivenessAdd convenience to the Android user experience
body:
## Log
------------------
Launched to Google Play Store this morning (3/11), check it out, leave some stars: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tim.wifibook
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
